name: Tiny Echo
description: Explore this lovingly crafted world with all its odd inhabitants as you deliver messages to the spirits. Make your mark in the wordless narrative - with a Tiny Echo.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Athlon X2 2.8 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660, ATI Radeon HD 2xxx Storage: 3 GB available space
